title: More Twitter Drama, Amazon Post-Pandemic, and Guest Jon Favreau on the Midterms
description:
Kara is joined by guest host Kai Ryssdal, Host and Senior Editor of Marketplace! They discuss the latest dispatches from Elon Musk’s Twitter, from layoffs to subscription plans. Also, Amazon’s new post-pandemic reality, and the Fed’s latest interest rate hike. Friend of Pivot Jon Favreau stops by to break down what’s to come in the midterms.
You can find Kai on Twitter at @kairyssdal, and Jon at @jonfavs.
If you want to get involved in the last days before the midterms, visit VoteSaveAmerica.com.
You can listen to Kara’s new show, On with Kara Swisher, here.
Send us your questions! Call 855-51-PIVOT or go to nymag.com/pivot.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
